game.name: Plague Alchemist
game.genres: Adventure, Indie, RPG, Simulation, Early Access
game.shortDescription: A story-rich pixel art RPG about discovery, corruption, and survival through alchemy. Explore, craft, and uncover the secrets behind a plague spreading through a world bound by decaying leylines.
